name: SEX with HITLER
description:
Sex With Hitler is a unique blend of visual novel and top-down shooter.
Fuhrer - is the protagonist of the story, He lost everything and now he’s looking for a new life.
Along with him, you will fight in the fields of World War II and meet five unique heroines, among whom you will find both friends and enemies.
War-shattered Berlin has new rules, and you will become the one for whom the last word will be.
Game Features:
- cool mechanics of a top-down shooter in a WWII setting
- unique, fun story
- stunning art
All characters are over 18 years old
